attributes.action: Reverse his decision to use £1m of taxpayer's money to train imams to preach in UK mosques
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tony Blair has launched a £1m project to fund the training of Muslim clerics in the UK, we the signees believe this to be contrary to the official secular policy of the British government. We ask The prime minister to reverse his decision and to block any further use of Taxpayer's money to fund the training of any religious leaders.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
